when possible; "Bob ate the pie" is good... "The pie was eaten by Bob", not so 
much.

so good. Best? Just like that? No reasons, no context, nothing...

Sep 30, 2008 ... I don't use the word forgo/ forgoes very often, but the last time I did, ... Because 
this sentence should have used the verb form, it should ... is a good reminder that
, in most of your writing, ACTIVE voice is the best choice. Bob ate the pie. ... your 
elbow to say what you mean was The pie was eaten by Bob.
